ref: 9084 *phucca ʻ defective ʼ. [Cf. *bucca -- 1, *bhucca -- and list s.vv. phakka -- and *bukka -- 4]
Ku. phucco ʻ undersized, short, dwarfish ʼ;
N. phuco ʻ small, little boy ʼ, phuci ʻ little girl ʼ, phucunu ʻ little fellow ʼ;

Si. pus ʻ empty, blank, blighted (of fruit) ʼ, puhu ʻ empty (of fruit) ʼ, pussa ʻ unproductive, blighted, having no kernel ʼ, pussā ʻ animal born without testicles or castrated when very young ʼ, pussī ʻ barren cow ʼ, pusiyā ʻ old and decrepit ox ʼ.
